equip_group-20000001: When using the complete set of SHD special equipment, Agent Vector gains the ability to significantly increase her echelon's overall survivability.
equip_group-20000002: When using the complete set of SHD special equipment, Agent 416 gains the new ability to effectively weaken her enemies.
equip_group-20000003: With a full set of gear, Mosin-Nagant can maximize her performance on the battlefield. Everything's gonna be fine.
equip_group-20000004: With a full set of 16LAB special equipment, ST AR-15 receives a powerful boost to her combat performance, and her secondary weapon also becomes more wieldy.
equip_group-20000005: With a full set of 16LAB special equipment, Stechkin receives a powerful boost to her ability to support her echelon and boost its overall combat performance.
equip_group-20000006: With a full set of camouflage equipment, Type 64 can blend in better in forested combat environment and perform unexpected attacks on enemies.
equip_group-20000007: Wearing her complete set, Gr MP5 is much more agile on the battlefield and can deliver information and supplies much more quickly.
equip_group-20000008: Decked out in the full set of custom-made equipment, Gr MG4 can take out her targets with great accuracy even on chaotic battlefields.
equip_group-20000009: Decked out in the full set of custom-made items, Makarov can command T-Dolls with greater effectiveness on the battlefield.
equip_group-20000010: Wearing her complete set, PPSh-41 can now work more seamlessly with other T-Dolls and is always ready to achieve personal glory.
equip_group-20000011: Wearing her complete set, PPK can now inflict exquisite pain on others to her heart's content.
equip_group-20000012: Squad 404's custom set for 416 can greatly improves her combat performance.
equip_group-20000013: A new type of hollow-point rounds custom made for UMP45 with greatly reduced sonic boom.
equip_group-20000014: Squad 404's custom set for UMP9 can greatly improves her combat performance.
equip_group-20000015: Wearing her complete set, Type 88 now subverts people's understanding of modern combat mechanics.
equip_group-20000016: Wearing her complete set, M1919A4 is now packed with explosive power and will never be taken lightly by her enemies again.
equip_group-20000017: Wearing her complete set, Type 56-1 now benefits from powerful combat buffs and will resolutely carry out her orders even if it is at the cost of her life.
equip_group-20000018: Wearing her complete set, MG3 can now strike with greater efficacy in mobile warfare. As a result, she is receiving a lot more combat assignments.
equip_group-20000019: NTW-20's custom set is outstanding for both fighting and motorbiking.
equip_group-20000020: Type 97S's custom set is imbued with the power of justice to expel all evil.
equip_group-20000021: Gr G3's custom set reflects her determination to help others.
equip_group-20000022: M1911's custom set is named thus at the Doll's personal behest.
equip_group-20000023: This set tailor-made for LWMMG utilizes highly cost-effective materials, so no money is wasted.
equip_group-20000024: This set tailor-made for M950A is a symbol of friendship and her wish to keep moving forward side-by-side with her friends.
equip_group-20000025: This set tailor-made for Gr G36 helps her maintain her poise as a maid while working.
equip_group-20000026: This set tailor-made for RO635 gives her command ability a boost and allows her to live up to her full potential.
equip_group-20000027: This set tailor-made for Bren helps her reach new heights.
equip_group-20000028: This set tailor-made for AA-12 helps her solve problems in a more civilized and effective manner.
equip_group-20000029: A set custom-made for SV-98 that facilitates more effective computation.
equip_group-20000030: A set custom-made for PKP. She will not be at a disadvantage even when vastly outnumbered by enemies.
equip_group-20000031: A set custom-made for Welrod MkII. She shall continue to honor her pledge to live in the shadows and put all evil six feet under.
equip_group-20000032: A set custom-made for STEN MkII. Now that she faces up to her flaws, she can finally stand on her own.
equip_group-20000033: SR-3MP's custom set enables her to become even more agile, allowing her to strike deep into enemy forces and weave between enemies at will.
equip_group-20000034: StG44's custom set enables her to fulfil her purpose and accomplish entrusted tasks; to achieve that, equipment upgrades are inevitable.
equip_group-20000035: WA2000's custom set improves her combat abilities. One's combat techniques often employed during battle shall become second nature.
equip_group-20000036: M1895's custom set helps her shine in missions such as cleaning up battlefields and sorting through salvage. Perhaps at some point it will even help her obtain important information.
equip_group-20000037: Gr G41's custom set. So long as it's the Commander's order, tasks will be accomplished with the fullest effort!
equip_group-20000038: M500's custom set. Nothing is too much to face up against if you have a trusted partner by your side!
equip_group-20000039: Am RFB's custom set. Why is she playing games if this set is supposed to be made for combat?!
equip_group-20000040: SAA's custom set. One can only have the strength for a duel after a cola!
